agentCommonConfig.contextDesc: Context Window refers to the amount of contextual information that the model can refer to (including user input, historical dialogue information, and recalled reference information). Currently, only the maximum length of the recalled reference information is set
agentCommonConfig.variableNotExist: The {varName} variable does not exist, please modify it

llm.modelAutoTip: Model generation: model automatically fills in content
llm.useVariableTip: Use variable: can refer to variables from Agent configuration, support .
llm.selectModelTip: Select model: when the parameter is LLM, the user selects the model added in the model factory list
llm.disabledInterventionTip: Currently only supports enabling human intervention in one LLM block
llm.promptVarDataDesc: The results of recalling graph concepts, entities and other information
llm.dolphinVarError: cannot be used as a variable name
llm.dolphinVarNameError: Variable names can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores, and cannot start with a number.
